name: Longhui Yuan
address: Room 1101, Central building, Beijing Institute of Technology, Beijing
introduction: I am a master's student at Beijing Institute of Technology, advised by Prof. Shuang Li. I received my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from BIT(2018-2022)

My research interests include transfer learning, data-efficient learning and online learning (particularly domain adaptation, active learning, test-time adaptation, source-free domain adaptation) across vision tasks and domains.
